name: Bosses Drop Sundering Charms
description: Allows the Sundering Charms to drop from bosses and/or regular monsters.
author: Jobus

config.name: Add to Boss Item Pool
config.description: Enable the sundering charms for Hell act boss item pools (Andariel, Duriel, etc).

config.name: Boss Drop Probability
config.description: Probability for Hell act bosses to drop sundering charms (value is a weight, not a percentage). Higher value = higher chance. 5 = ~20%. 0.5 = ~2.5%. 0 = 0%.

config.name: Equal Boss Drop Ratio
config.description: Make all the different sundering charms have an equal chance to drop. Normally, the fire and cold charms are the most common, and the magic charm the most rare.

config.name: Add to Regular Item Pool
config.description: Enable the sundering charms for the regular item pool (drop from any Hell monster). Warning: As a consequence, Gheed's Fortune becomes 7x rarer.
